act:
640346 THE INDIAN POWER ALCOHOL (REPEAL) ACT, 2000
ACT NO. 32 OF 2000 [ 25th August, 2000.]
An Act to repeal the Indian Power Alcohol Act, 1948.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- first Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
320520 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Indian Power Alcohol (Repeal) Act, 2000.
1093913 2Repeal of Act 22 of 1948.- The Indian Power Alcohol Act, 1948 is hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
